mdRecord.dcterms:title: Byrd Hylton Home; Originally James LeSueur House; Kitterman
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 661_Byrd & Martha Hylton Home; Log double section house lived in by Byrd and Martha Hylton. Original log section (upper) built by James LeSueur circa 1850; newer section may have been added by George Kitterman. Federal troops stayed here 1865,
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Kitterman family
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
